title: Into Darkness - Dungeon Atmospheres Music Pack
description: Venture into the chilling depths of ancient dungeons, mysterious caverns, and shadowy catacombs with haunting melodies and eerie ambient soundscapes.
longDescription:
Into Darkness is a collection of 40 suspenseful, moody, and gritty dungeon music tracks, excellent for any fantasy/action-rpg game, and perfect for roguelikes and dungeon crawlers. Making use of a symphony orchestra and a variety of hybrid electronic techniques, this pack delivers dark themes, ethereal textures, and washes of ambient soundscapes which thrust the player into darkness and forces them to find their way out or brave further into the depths. The pack offers a good mix of the spooky, the mysterious, and the enchanting. 


Pack Preview:

https://youtu.be/8dmKAocUJh0

 

This pack contains 20 original tracks with 20 additional looping versions, and is organized into 2 main folders, each with their own sub folders.

  • Instrumental
  • Full Tracks
  • Loops
  • Ambient
  • Full Tracks
  • Loops

Music Quality:

Into Darkness was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

40 Stereo WAV music tracks (24-bit/44.1kHz)

Bit rate: 1411 kbps

755MB uncompressed

1 hour 14 minutes and 50 seconds of music

20 looping tracks

20 non-looping tracks

Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
